reviews.review: The story is amazing, the game play is amazing, the characters are amazing. Everything in this game is amazing.

Fantastic game! I loved the story and the puzzles. It felt as immersive to me as Half-Life and Half-Life 2. Be sure to finish the game and then read the comic in the Extras. Even more story immersion! Hope you enjoy it too.
es ist ein  geiles spiel aber es ist richtig schwer

Как мы видим, плюсов больше.
Если бы кто-нибудь спросил <какая головаломка не скучная?>   Я бы сказал <portal 2>
Не плохая игра, что бы потренировать свой мозг, разгадкой кучи головоломок.
It's a true classic. Played on xbox years ago, and now just beat it 100% on PC.
Don't play this game if you don't want to have trust issues with your partner. But 10/10 would recommend xD
服务器经常掉线 玩不起双人
玩法新奇有趣，适合各种人群
this game is the best game i ever played
flying through a hole is the best thing to do in the game
One of the classics of all time.
My friend told me about this game and I'd heard about it. I got Portal and Portal 2 and they are better then they look.
This is my favorite video game of all time forever. That's it. That's my whole review.

This game is exceptionally good.  Plays really well and there is a great sense of satisfaction on completion of the many puzzling tests put before you.  The dark humour of the characters makes it even more enjoyable.  If you haven't played Portal 2, you are missing out.
if this isnt already in your library what are you even doing
Superbe jeu en mode histoire et la coop et tout autant génial !
Really a masterpiece of a game. Nice graphics, voice acting, story, game mechanics, sarcasm. Portal 2 got it all. Its really worth the money
buy it, play it, enjoy it.
Why wouldn't you play this game? Get with the program!
so glad i got my companion back in the end
Best game to follow the original
really fun that you can play with your friends. the puzzles can be difficult but it wouldn't be fun if there wasn't any challenges.
As on old review once went: It boils down to this, you need to play Portal 2.

Started playing Portal 2 again with my Girlfriend to get her a bit more into first person games. And Portal 2 is the best fucking game for this. Like serious if you have a GF / Good Friend who dosen't yet play Video Games alot and want to get them into gaming this is one of the best games to start.
a f i g e n n o )

This is one of my favourite games I have ever played, it is genuinely something that is very special to me. While this game is not as haunting or uncomfortably lonely as the first game it isn't trying to be, and makes up for that with a longer playtime, even better humour and an even more compelling story. The music is also fantastic being very varied in its tone but still incredibly memorable. If you have not played this game, then I very highly recommend you do, it's fantastic
Ist genauso gut wie Portal 1, wenn nicht sogar eine Ecke besser.
Geniale Story, bestes Story-Spiel das ich jemals gespielt habe
神作不解释，脑洞太夸张了。10分满分我给20
Харошая игра развивает логику мне понравилось))))
Loved the story part of the game.
Tek başına Oynarsan kötü ama arkadaşlarınla oynarken güzel oluyo
真的好玩，一玩就上瘾了。停不下来。

老实说难度并不算太高，我想大部分人还是能玩通关。
一定要带上你的好友一起玩，这个游戏的联机模式非常适合合作。
虽然我他妈的一条单身狗，但是和基佬玩的还是挺开心的。

讲道理，打折后就4块钱，为什么不给你的游戏生涯增加一款名作呢？

很多年后，我们明白，时间是可以战胜一切的，记得常和你的朋友联系，
还有记得戴口罩。
This game is a really fun puzzle/fighting game
jogo bom com bastante pazzles dificeis,so recomendo nao jogar co-op com um amigo engrasadao sabe ne
Просто выебите нет, ИЗНАСИЛУЙТЕ эту игру во все щели.
绝佳的双人游玩游戏，在互帮互助中闯过难关，增进友谊，和好朋友一起玩吧。
Objectively one of the greatest games of all time. Fun with friends and a good story.
с воркшопом эта игра практически бесконечна, самая интересная головоломка)))
